TopicTitle: The ROUND8 memorial thread - UPDATE: It's alive!

Articles.Content:
> 
> Victory! Max just announced in Squadcast, new Xenon tank, Round-8 is staying!
> Thanks for listening Squad!

So does this mean I have to give up my Round8 PartHat? B-b-but, it's so...dashing. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Yay! The Round8 lives!

..And there was much rejoicing.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yciX2meIkXI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

ROUND-8 not being replaced?

Better grab the shovels and start digging the grave then.

![Market_Gardener.png](https://wiki.teamfortress.com/w/images/f/fb/Market_Gardener.png)
Huzzah! Huzzah for the glorious Knights of the Order of the Golden Toroid! And to SQUAD, for listening.
They did listen. Wonderful. Thanks to all supporters of the Round8! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Couldnt you just mod the part to be like the old part? thus making this thread pointless?

People like to share their crafts... And play stock.
Well... Back to business then for me since we won now
Woooo! So they listened to the rabble! Awesome. Thanks Squad! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks Squad!

You devs prove again and again that you really care and listen to your userbase.

Long live the ROUND8!

They listened!

Thank you everyone at SQUAD!

But guys, more importantly:

We did it...

We did it!

Thanks SQUAD for listening! You are the best developers!

See you in game, ROUND-8!
The round 8 is saved ? Awesome ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) Long live the space donut
The lifesaver lives? +1 to squad for having open ears. Personally, I thought that the round 8 could have been a nice xenon tank, but I like the newer one MUCH better

> 
> The lifesaver lives? +1 to squad for having open ears. Personally, I thought that the round 8 could have been a nice xenon tank, but I like the newer one MUCH better

Yeah, I'm happy that they listened to the community, even though they didn't really comment on it in the forum, or maybe wanted to surprise us during the squadcast.

Well, as my last entry in this campaign I decided to build a new lander, which I think might be the best and most compact small lander I've built yet!

I was going to post the whole Apollo-style mission but imgur is flaking out so you will have to settle for the money shots from photobucket. Enjoy

Relevant Mods are Proc Fairings, FAR, and RealChute

![2015-04-18_00011.jpg](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v445/Alshain/2015-04-18_00011.jpg)

![2015-04-18_00029_1.jpg](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v445/Alshain/2015-04-18_00029_1.jpg)

EDIT: Got it finally

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/MSCZX)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T18:45:43Z" title="04/18/2015 06:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by Alshain**
Long Live the ROUND-8! Back to business as usual!
The devs *finally* listened to the forums. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> The devs *finally* listened to the forums. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

...when the removed the Barn, changed the way professions and experience worked, and added aerodynamics, entry heat, and heat shields.

Oh and also when they kept the ROUND-8.
no its not alive it just got renamed to the donut tank. I personally liked the round-8 one better.

For the confused, a while back Squad changed the function of one of the fuel tanks but then changed it back. But it's just a bit of history now. 

And guys, replying to complain that something is a necropost is just additional clutter on top of the post itself, so those remarks have been removed.
